vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
βαπτ-ιστής, οῦ, ὁ,
one that dips: baptizer, ὁ β. the Baptist, [NT+1st c.AD+]: metaphorically of the Passion, [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
Baptist, a surname of John
one who baptizes, a baptist, Mt. 3:1; 11:11, 12
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 施洗者: 約翰的別號
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 施洗者: 约翰的别号
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Báp-tít; kẻ làm phép báp tem.
